job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description:
Software Developer (Junior to Intermediate Level)
Isoprime Corporation is a small software development and consulting firm based in Naperville, Illinois.  We provide software technology consulting and packaged software products to serve the healthcare market – primarily hospital-based neonatal intensive care units.
Job duties include software design, coding, testing, maintenance, and customer support. Being a small company, Isoprime offers the opportunity to experience all facets of software development and get extensive experience with a wide variety of tools.
Our software products are built using Microsoft technology, including VB.Net and SQL Server, along with other supporting tools such as Crystal Reports.
Job qualifications include classes, training, or experience with an object-oriented programming language such as VB.NET, C#, Java. Experience or extensive training in SQL is also required.  Experience or training in Crystal Reports, OLE DB (ADO), and MS Access would be useful. Background in healthcare applications is a plus.
Excellent English-language skills are required, and
you must have the permanent legal right to work in the US without sponsorship
.
We are a small company looking for a developer who will take ownership of their work, is eager to learn and grow, and can work well as part of a small team of developers.
Responsibilities
Design, Develop and Test new features for our customers
Work with customers on implementing and configuring our software
Answer support calls and emails to help customers troubleshoot problems
Qualifications
Experience or training in .NET (or another object-oriented language)
Knowledge and understanding of SQL and Database Design
Comfortable working with customers to troubleshoot problems
Preferred
BS in Computer Science or related degree
VB .NET Experience
Crystal Reports (or other reporting tools) experience
Benefits
Competitive Salary
Participation in all aspects of software development from design to rollout
Retirement Plan
Company holidays and paid time off
